EmailTemplate.description: Email used to new user with the profile Brand Marketing SP
EmailTemplate.name: Brand Marketing SP Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Brand Marketing SP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to Salesforce!
You are now set up as a Brand marketing SP user in Salesforce.
Sarah Fellows is your key marketing support and monthly Salesforce induction sessions and also weekly Salesforce marketing training sessions on a Tuesday at 3pm.
The marketing salesforce user guide is your first point of contact and can be found here - click here
We hope you enjoy using Salesforce.
